item.title: Davinci Resolve Cloud Editor - Create Series of Stories in shared cloud project - Upwork
item.description:
Work within a shared Davinci Resolve Cloud project file that we have already created a longer form video. Create a series of social media shorts (stories) - vertical resolution - based on our main speakers comments in an interview.  Each separate video would be created on a new timeline in our shared project. You will have access to the rest of our project files and original timeline.  Because only Proxy files will be synced to you we will do the final color-grade in-house and provide final export.

We have a transcript of the interview and it was shot with A and B cam. as well as folder of great B-roll.

We need 12 social stories created from this project and the turnaround should be about 7-10 days.

We would like to see concepts of one first, with styling and music. Once the first is approved you can execute on the rest.  The idea is to create a cohesive series.

Subject matter is about social etiquette, party planning, and events. The main speaker is a book author and this series will help as a lead up to a new book launch.

Sample to our main video here: https://vimeo.com/clintbrewerphoto/review/968878735/58b1a67b11


Thank you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing for HazTek - Upwork
item.description:
Take Zoom and MS Teams videos and edit.  There will be a couple of videos to edit per month.  Ideally the videos will be compressed but not to lose quality and saved in an mp3 or mp4 format.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Digital Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Videographer In Atlanta - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to help me capture a proposal it will roughly be about 1.5 hours of capture (could be 2-3 hours total time on location). This will be in Norcross Ga. The event is Thursday, June 26th The arrival time for setup will be around 7:15pm.

To clarify I am going to be shooting most of the main footage, you will be a B Cam operator, there is no editing involved, this will be an easy couple hours. I do not need a bunch of equipment, I will be there with my stuff, I just need a backup camera running, and for the B-Cam operating to be getting footage.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Camera, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
